meta.title: Bistro BUDEX - Berry Food
meta.description: Bistro BUDEX in České Budějovice. Unique concept for corporate and business meetings with professional facilities and exquisite catering.

hero.title: BISTRO BUDEX
hero.subtitle: Looking for a place where productivity meets comfort, inspiration meets taste, and views meet extraordinary atmosphere? Bistro BUDEX is a unique concept for your corporate and business meetings – from morning breakfasts, workshops and presentations to evening networking with accompanying programs.

content.facilitiesIntro: With us, it’s not just about tables and chairs. With us, ideas are born. You’ll find an environment where everything is prepared for your event to flow smoothly and for your guests to feel truly comfortable.
content.signatureParagraph: We know that good food is part of good cooperation. Therefore, as part of every event, count on exquisite catering tailored to your needs, prepared by the Berry Food team.
content.experiencesIntro: At Bistro BUDEX, we combine professional facilities with an atmosphere where you can work and have fun – you can expect an environment that inspires and tastes that are unforgettable.

menuServices.title: LUNCHES & CAFÉ
menuServices.description: The space offers daily dining for up to 100 new guests, with more than just a diverse lunch menu. The café and pastry shop entice with quality coffee beans and homemade desserts.

menuServices.title: BUSINESS EVENTS
menuServices.description: During the day, the space can also be used for creative brunches, corporate presentations or friendly meetings when welcoming guests, in a pleasant atmosphere that supports informal networking and creative ideas.

menuServices.title: EVENING EVENTS
menuServices.description: In the evening hours, the space transforms into an ideal place for corporate parties, private celebrations or themed tastings, where guests can enjoy unique experiences combined with top gastronomy and quality service.

facilities: Wide-angle LED TV with connection options
specialties: Italian coffee from lever espresso machine
whyChooseUs: Natural materials and newly equipped interior
